short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension changes all mentions of 'Milo Yiannopolous' to 'Perez Hitler'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Changes all mentions of Milo Yiannopoulos to "Perez Hitler"

NOTES:

2/23/17 - No UI yet, so the plugin cannot be turned on/off at will. I'm adding a UI ASAP, and will update this plugin in the next 24 hours with that change.
